arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
translation: Those who believe in the unseen and establish prayer and spend out of what We have provided for them.
transliteration: Innallatheena yu'minoona bil-ghaybi wa yuqeemoona as-salata wa mimma razaqnahum yunfiqoon

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
transliteration: Wallatheena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablika wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
translation: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
transliteration: Wallatheena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablika wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ

transliteration: Wallatheena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablika wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ

transliteration: Wallatheena yu'minoona bima unzila ilayka wa ma unzila min qablika wa bil-akhirati hum yooqinoon

arabic: وَالَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَا أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
